description:
Description


Achieve perfectly curled lashes effortlessly with the BEAUND Lash Curl.

Designed for precision and safety, this heated eyelash curler delivers long-lasting, natural curls without damage.
Compact and easy to use—elevate your lash game anytime, anywhere.

Featuring an ergonomic design that mirrors the natural curve of lashes, BEAUND's first-ever 4th generation premium lash curler creates dramatic curls in just a few strokes.
Its optimized temperature ensures a 24-hour hold, setting even hard-to-reach roots with ease.
The device heats up quickly, making it perfect for styling lashes, eyebrows, and baby hairs—ideal for quick and versatile use, even during busy mornings.
 
How To Use

Press the power button and set the desired temperature mode.
Apply and dry mascara evenly.
Gently lift the curler from the root to the tip of the eyelashes, holding for about 3 seconds at the end.
Repeat the process to achieve the desired curl.

description:
Description


The beginning of precise skin care, with the powerful Triple Synergy Shot.

SIGNATURE ALLTHERA DOUBLE SHOT

A system simultaneously administering dual ultrasonic waves and central RF, 3 energy pulses are delivered per shot to help generate collagen and elastin, essential for improving skin elasticity. Experience unlimited RF + ultrasonic waves with the Allthera Double Shot, without any cartridge replacement needed. Start your easy, at-home skincare journey with the d’Alba Signature Allthera Double Shot.

USER GUIDE

Intensive Care Mode · Pre-Shot Care Mode | 1-3 times a day, daily

We advise our customers to stick to 40 shots per session, 1-3 times a day since the product induces deep heat within the skin. Using it excessively in a single session may cause irritation, so it is advised to use it with an appropriate interval.

Cooling Care Mode | 1-3 times a day, daily

In the Cooling Care Mode, you can use it up to 2 times consecutively. Overusage will activate overheating prevention mode, and we advise you to pause the device for 10 minutes before using it again.
 
How To Use

Intensive Care Mode (with voice guidance) · Pre-Shot Care Mode (without voice guidance ×)

40 shots | 5 levels | Face & Body Care

After applying sufficient skincare, press the head of the device against your skin. Make sure to lift the device after each shot to avoid using it on the same area, then move to different areas and administer the shots accordingly.

Cooling Care Mode (3 minutes)

After applying sufficient skincare, press the head of the device against your skin and slowly move it while massaging for 3 minutes.

Language Change

After turning on the power, press the MODE button to switch between modes.

If you press the MODE button for 3 seconds, the language will change.

The device supports a total of four languages: Korean/English/Chinese/Japanese.

description:
Description


N Mode EMS V-Shape Face Massager for Slimming and Double Chin Removal
No longer need to fuss with rubbing or tapping.
Simply use it as it is, and it will naturally shape a slimmer face line for you. Rediscover your hidden jawline with “N Mode”

Those concerned with double chins or sagging jawlines
Those with drooping facial or chin skin, or undefined jawlines
Those who find using gua sha or galvanic devices too tedious
Those who experience facial puffiness from frequent late-night snacks or social drinking
5 EMS Microcurrent Modes
Care for your deep facial muscles, enhancing elasticity from within.

CHECK POINT

With the strap attached, you can effortlessly manage skin elasticity just by wearing it.
The EMS microcurrent is divided into 15 intensity levels for detailed care.
The combination of 5 types of LED lights and vibration function allows for comprehensive skin care all in once.
Includes massage pads to also take care of your trapezius muscles.
 
How To Use

Remove the transparent film attached to the EMS massage panel.
Wipe the EMS massage panel with a wet tissue.
Attach the head strap to the main body.
Apply a highly hydrating skincare product, such as a booster gel, to your face.
Press and hold the power button to start the device, indicated by a sound.
Press the power button briefly to change the mode.
Ensure to check the intensity before wearing it on your body.
Adjust the head strap to fit your size and ensure it adheres closely to your face.
Press and hold the power button to turn off the device, indicated by a sound.     (The device will automatically turn off after the recommended usage time of 15 minutes.)

reviews.title: Nmode Pro
reviews.content: Very easy to use

reviews.title: Good functions
reviews.content: This product has a lot of functions including heat, vibration and LED in addition to the EMS.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.content: I just used it for one week and i see visible improvement and felt lifted after 15 mins. Session, i’ll keep on using it and recommend to my friends who’s looking for a device. I wish that the gel booster is available in the website.

reviews.title: So effective!
reviews.content: I had been looking for a device like this to tighten my chin and neck and define my jawline. This is probably one of the best investments I have made. I have noticed a difference in my jawline in just 2 weeks of use. I love that it works the muscles to keep you toned and that you can adjust the frequency. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.content: Using it daily for 15 minutes less than a week. The face shows some improvement.

- Affordable Glow Booster: Mini Booster Pro is a glow and soothing maximazing beauty wand that helps skincare absorption and fill up radiance & glow from within.
- Portable and Easy to use: With its compact design, Mini Booster Pro fits perfectly in your bag, delivering powerful, trusted results wherever you go.
- Intensive soothing care: Our gentle skincare wand is designed for all skin types, including troubled skin. It’s a powerful yet soothing tool, perfect for after spot care and enhancing your skincare routine.
- Proven Benefits: Unlock transformative skincare achievements with the Booster Pro Mini, enhancing skin absorption rate by 562% and maximizing the effectiveness of your beloved everyday skincare products. *Clinical Trial Tested by the Tego science.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
- Made In Korea: medicube Mini Booster Pro is proudly designed and crafted in Korea, featuring medicube's exclusive advanced technology.
- Charge: No USB charging cable included. To charge the product, use a USB Type-C cable with an input voltage of DC 5V and a maximum of 2A.

description:
Description


Discover the transformative elasticity care power of the AGE-R High Focus Shot.

The High Focus Shot cares for the skin layer the supports the overall skin, effectively helps to plump up the overall facial contour. Achieve flawless, MFU care with automatic dot scanning. The MFU is evenly delivered to the skin, allowing anyone to easily care of elasticity.
 


The MFU is evenly delivered to the skin, allowing anyone to easily care of elasticity.
Affordable at-home skin Care : minial pain, unlimited-use, ultra-precise elasticity shots for home use.
Maximize Your Results with the AGE-R App: Enhance your skincare routine with the AGE-R app, featuring custom guide videos, a tracking calendar, visual progress tracking, and personalized device settings for an optimized experience.

How To Use
Basic Usage Instructions
1. After cleansing, be sure to dry the skin and apply an appropriate amount of the designated gel (AGE-R Booster Gel) to the desired area.
2. Press and hold the power button for 2-3 seconds to turn it on.
3. Briefly press the button to select the desired intensity level.
4. Press the SHOT button and slowly glide the head over your skin, ensuring the head makes full contact with your skin.
*Be careful not to apply continuous (overlapping) shots to the same area or to linger on one area during use.
Precautions
1. Avoid Consecutive Shots : Be careful not to apply continuous (overlapping) shots to the same area.
2. Recommended Usage Frequency
- Recommended Frequency: 1-2 times a week
- Recommended Shots: 600-1200 shots
- Please follow the recommended usage instructions.
*Be careful not to apply continuous (overlapping) shots to the same area or to linger on one area during use.
3. Recommended Usage Method
Before use, ensure that the head is in full contact with the skin, leaving no gaps between the head and the skin.
4. Prohibited Areas of Use
Avoid using on the following areas: between the eyebrows, around the eyes, eyeballs, philtrum, lips, around the mouth, nose, jawbone, Adam's apple, and thyroid area.
*The seller and manufacturer are not responsible for any side effects caused by using the device on prohibited areas

reviews.title: Really works!
reviews.content: This device actually works! I felt my neck & under chin tighter after 1st use. I used with Medicube collagen jelly but I will try with booster gel next. It's recommended to use Ultra Tune after Focus shot which is what I did and the results were amazing. Hopefully my double chin will shrink even more.

description:
Description

Medicube’s all-new innovative technology that is effective for elasticity and line care.​
1. High-Tech 2 in 1 Skin Care Tool: Our Dual Tune-Wave™ technology delivers a luxurious home care experience, caring for skin elasticity and lines, leaving your skin looking more supple.
2. Easy to Use : Don't need a specific gel! Simply use our Ultra Tune after your skincare products have fully absorbed! It's the game changer that will boost your skin's radiance and elasticity.
3. Home Spa Experience: Enjoy luxury home care in the comfort of your own home. It's perfectly fine to use it every day!
4. Maximize Your Results with the AGE-R App: Enhance your skincare routine with the AGE-R app, featuring custom guide videos, a tracking calendar, visual progress tracking, and personalized device settings for an optimized experience.

HOW IT WORKS
RF
Ultra Tune enhances skin elasticity by delivering gentle, warming energy to your skin. Using RF technology, it stimulates the skin for a visibly firmer and more youthful appearance.
MC
MC helps add volume to facial contours by targeting key areas like the eyes, smile lines, and mouth with microcurrent technology.


 
How To Use
After your skincare routine, use it 1-3 times a day while holding the head closely and moving slowly. It only activates when all six tips are fully in contact with the skin.
Precautions
1. Be sure to move continuously and do not stop at one area while using the device.
If you feel a strong sensation of heat, immediately remove the device head from your skin and use at the lowest level.
2. When first using the device, start at level 1 and adjust accordingly.

3. Do not use on these areas
Adam’s apple, eye areas (eyelids, directly below the eyes)

Precautions

reviews.title: For my mom
reviews.content: I bought MEDICUBE AGE-R booster pro, but didn’t work after 2months of use. (Have to reset and broke again , so reset twice in 4months) .So I’m little worrying to buy MEDICUBE DEVICE AGAIN. But my mom wanna try this device , So purchased. It’s has been only 2wks and she doesn’t get a result yet. I’ll update after a month again.

reviews.title: Difficult to use on forehead UPDATE
reviews.content: **UPDATE: I tried this again with Age-r serum from medicube and it worked so much better! I didn't struggle as much on my forehead & it made great contact everywhere else. I love it. ** ......They say you don't need a conductive gel but you kinda do. I had difficulty getting this to make perfect contact on my skin even on flatter areas like cheeks & neck. My forehead was nearly impossible which was disappointing cuz that's the wrinkle I want to get rid of. Even when all 6 tips were touching my skin it still didn't think it was making good contact. So I started using it with a watery serum & it worked much better. Forehead was still tricky but worked a lot better. The warmth feels so good & relaxing & my pores were so much smaller the next day. I tried this with Medicube collagen jelly & Numbuzin No. 5 serum. I had better success with the No. 5 serum since it's more watery.

product_name: Madeca Prime Facial Toning Device (+Free Ampoule 30ml)
description:
Description

CENTELLIAN 24 MADECA PRIME FACIAL TONING DEVICE - Achieve 'glass skin' with this advanced microcurrent beauty device. Madeca Prime enhances skin radiance, improves elasticity, and boosts the absorption of your skincare products, making your complexion 1.7 times more luminous and increasing absorption by 3.3 times compared to manual application.
TRIANGULAR HEAD FOR PRECISE APPLICATION - The unique triangular head design allows for precise application, targeting all facial contours effectively, ensuring every part of your face receives optimal care.
LIGHT & CONVENIENT - Weighing just 4.3oz (122g), lighter than a smartphone, the Madeca Prime device offers unparalleled ease of use and convenience, making it perfect for daily use and travel.
VERSATILE WITH ANY SKINCARE PRODUCTS While it pairs excellently with the Centellian 24 Boosting Ampoule series for maximum synergy, it is also highly effective with your regular skincare products, enhancing their benefits and delivering superior results.
PACKAGE LIST - The package includes the main microcurrent 1 facial massager device, a comprehensive 1 instruction manual for clear usage guidance, 1 USB charging cable for easy recharging, a protective 1 travel pouch for safe storage and portability, and an adapter (note: US export versions may not include the adapter). Everything you need to start your skincare routine is included, ensuring a seamless experience from unboxing to daily use.

reviews.title: Must Daily Item~
reviews.content: design is sleek and user-friendly. It’s lightweight, comfortable to hold, and easy to use, even for someone new to facial toning devices like me. The device features multiple settings that allow you to customize the treatment to your skin’s needs, which I really appreciate. The vibrations are gentle but effective, and it’s soothing to use on the skin. I noticed a visible improvement in my skin texture and tone after just a few uses. My skin feels firmer, and the fine lines around my eyes and mouth have started to look softer. The toning and lifting effect is subtle but noticeable, which I love because it doesn't give off the overly done, artificial look. Another bonus is the inclusion of the Madeca Serum, which complements the device. The serum has a light, non-greasy feel and absorbs into my skin quickly, leaving it hydrated and refreshed. Using the device with the serum has made my skin feel smoother and more radiant overall.

original_name: [Centellian24] Madeca Prime Facial Toning Device (+Free Ampoule 30ml)

DescriptionFREE GIFT: Device Cap + PDRN Pink One Day Serum (10ea) 
Medicube’s first total care device that contains 6 key functions to achieve your skin goals.
This device combines the latest skincare technology- Electroporation, Microcurrent, EMS, Electric needles, LED and Sonic vibration, suitable to use for all skin types.
AGE-R Booster Pro is a high-tech beauty device that provides you professional-level skincare in the comfort of your own home.
Benefits include improved skincare product absorption, enhanced radiance, elasticity care, facial contouring and pore care With four easy-to-use modes, the device offers simplicity and effectiveness.
That's not all, you can experience a luxurious spa skincare through our AGE-R application

Achieve your skin goals with innovative technology.
- Don't need a conductive gel
Just use it with your skincare products! Bootser Pro will be the game changer in your skincare routine that makes your skin healthy and glowy
- Skin-contact sensor for personalized and safe
Equipped with a skin contact sensor that emits LED light only when it touches the skin.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.content: I’m absolutely loving the MEDICUBE AGE-R Booster Pro Pink! This total care device has completely transformed my skincare routine. With its 6 powerful functions—Electroporation, Microcurrent, EMS, Electric needles, LED, and Sonic vibration—it truly feels like I’m getting a professional facial right at home. I love that I don’t need any conductive gel; I can just use it with my favorite serums and creams, and it helps them absorb so much better. My skin looks so much brighter and healthier, and I’ve definitely noticed a boost in elasticity and a more contoured look. The four easy-to-use modes make it super simple to tailor to my needs each day, and I appreciate how safe it feels thanks to the skin-contact sensor that only activates when it’s touching my skin. Plus, the personalized care I get through the AGE-R app makes it even more convenient! Overall, the Booster Pro Pink has given me that radiant, glowy look I’ve always wanted—definitely a game changer for my skincare routine!
